If you have any questions regarding an order or to manage your account, you can always call to speak with a customer care representative directly at 1-800-754-6211.

Our current customer care phone hours are as follows:

Monday- Friday 9am-5pm EST

Saturday 9am-3pm EST

You can also communicate with us via email at cs@chamonixstore.com or chat with us on our live chat during the hours above.
